# Discussion

Here is a research chapter. Look a graph in Figure \@ref(fig:myfiguredummy).

```{r myfiguredummy, echo=F, eval=T, fig.width=9, fig.asp=1.0,  fig.cap='(ref:myfigure)'}
data <- data.frame(x=runif(10),y=runif(10))
xyplot(y~x, data, cex=2)
```

(ref:myfiguredummy) Here is a figure caption.

Also check out the associated data in Table \@ref(tab:mytabledummy).

